review: I bought a Fire Stick for my husband for Christmas.  It seemed to work fine for a day or two and then kept saying the network connection was unavailable and buffered constantly.  I have FIOS internet and NO problems with other wireless video devices.  Customer Support told me to return the Fire Stick.  I talked at length with Customer Support about how disappointed I was.  They promised to call back...I never heard from them.  Now I have my 2nd Fire Stick and it is doing the same thing.  I kept Amazon Prime specifically to watch TV shows with the Stick.  What a disappointment.
